name: Discount Hunter
description: Discount Hunter, powered by www.performanceaffiliate.com, this nifty extension is designed to enhance your shopping experience and help you keep more money in your pocket. Here's how it works: Once you've installed Discount Hunter, it springs into action the moment you visit an online store. If we have specific offers available for that particular website, you'll see them displayed right before your eyes, making sure you never miss out on the best deals. But that's not all! Even if you're on a similar website and we've got exciting offers waiting for you, our extension will cleverly showcase these offers too, opening up a world of savings possibilities.
